3.heading: Buxley, Miss.
3.title: "Hostile Environment"
3.author: by Mort Walker
3.appears_in: p. 25 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: Ms. Blips and Ms. Buxley give the General a refresher lesson about physical or sexual references.

4.heading: Buxley, Miss.
4.title: "I Bought That Red Dress I've Been Wanting"
4.author: by Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: Gen. Halftrack sees no good news, but Ms. Buxley has some.

5.heading: Buxley, Miss.
5.title: "I Don't Date Guys"
5.author: Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: Zero asks Miss Buxley if she'll go out with Killer, and she says, "How about you, Zero?"
Key word: Homosexuality.

6.heading: Buxley, Miss.
6.title: "I Hate Graffiti!"
6.author: Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: 'Gen. Halfwit is a dimbulb' and 'I [heart] Miss Buxley' are captions the General sees on wall drawings.

7.heading: Buxley, Miss.
7.title: "I Think It Only Works in Sports"
7.author: Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: The General thinks Arnold Palmer's comeback is great, then looks at Miss Buxley.

8.heading: Buxley, Miss.
8.title: "Looks Like a Good Day for Golf"
8.author: Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: Buxley points out that it's pouring outside, but Halftrack sees his desk piled with papers.

9.heading: Buxley, Miss.
9.title: "Maybe You Could Sell It To A Comic Strip"
9.author: Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: Ms Buxley and Ms Blips talk about General Halftrack's sexual harrassment and the potential for a movie deal.

10.heading: Buxley, Miss.
10.title: "Oh, Then Wiggle Away!"
10.author: Mort Walker
10.appears_in: p. 36 in Battered Husbands (Redondo Beach, CA : H. Gregory Associates, 1991).
notes: Summary: Ms. Blips tells Ms. Buxley to stop her sexy walking in the office, but she says she's on her way to ask the General for a raise.

11.heading: Buxley, Miss.
11.title: "She Wants To Know How Long She Can Shop"
11.author: Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: Miss Buxley asks the general how long it takes to play golf.

12.heading: Buxley, Miss.
12.title: "Something Important Must Have Come Up"
12.author: Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: General Halftrack doesn't call his officers for golf, because Miss Buxley is playing with him.

13.heading: Buxley, Miss.
13.title: "You Promised I Could Be In Charge While You're Out Playing Golf!"
13.author: Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: A promise is a promise, so the general instructs Ms. Buxley how to handle Lt. Fuzz while he's 'in charge:' Lock him in.

40.heading: Buyer's Guide for Comic Fandom.
40.title: Comics Buyer's Guide Video [videorecording] : news stories, film and home video from the collection of Alan L. Light.
40.author: [No author]
notes: 1 videocassette : col.
Available in Beta and VHS.

The history, format and purpose of the "Buyer's Guide for Comic Fandom" are discussed by Alan Light, Rick Best, Lavon Light, and Don and Maggie Thompson. Also included are scenes showing the production of the Buyer's Guide, a tour of a comics printing plant at Sparta, Ill., and interviews with Max Collins and Cat Yronwode. 1. Buyer's Guide for Comic Fandom. 2. Comic books, strips, etc.

Publication and distribution. I. Light, Alan L. II. Best, Rick. III. Light, Lavon. IV.Thompson, Don. V. Thompson, Maggie. VI. Collins, Max Allan. VII. Yronwode, Catherine, 1947- Call no.: PN6725.L53 1985
